key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities due to reliance on global supply chain and susceptibility to disruptions
Regulatory and compliance challenges in a highly regulated industry
Integration risks from the Smiths Medical acquisition
Intense competitive pressure from established players
Economic sensitivity tied to healthcare spending trends
Legal disputes potentially resulting in financial liabilities or reputational damage
controversies: Legal disputes, such as the case against Rymed Technologies, LLC
environmental_issues: Focus on environmentally friendly manufacturing processes and product designs
social_issues: Commitment to ethical standards and regulatory compliance
governance_issues: Oversight by the Audit and Compliance Committee
